creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Stephen Addiss and Audrey Seo in honor of Elizabeth Clark
description: two lines of calligraphy on decorated paper; paper decorated with horizontal wavelike motif; a few delicate plants; waves of blue fibers at top
dimension:
14 5/16 × 2 1/8 in. (36.35 × 5.4 cm) (image, tanzaku)
58 1/8 × 8 9/16 in. (147.64 × 21.75 cm) (mount, without roller)
title: At the Ōi River
